item.title: Words and sentences: by !kweiten ta ||ken
item.summary: Sentences on some |xam who visited !kweiten ta ||ken's husband ≠kasin, and where they come from. Words in the Katkop dialect, from ≠kásin (B XXV. 2355-2360), from !kwéiten ta //ken (L VI.-1. 3882, 3859-3897), and from Dia!kwãin (L V.-6. 4434 and 4435, 8. 4615 rev., 9. 4653 rev., etc.).
item.comments: 1) The page numbers in this book (VI-1) are duplicates of those in notebook IV-4, 2) p.3896v: names of |xam who visited ≠kasin (!kweiten ta ||ken's husband), 3) This story is found in Book VI-1
item.author: !kweiten ta ||ken (Rachel) (VI)
